name: (PLACEMENT) Choice - Reading
questionContents:
Mark the letter A, B, C, or D to indicate the word OPPOSITE in meaning to the underlined word 'critical':

One of the reasons why families break up is that parents are always critical of each other.

Mark the letter A, B, C, or D to indicate the word OPPOSITE in meaning to the underlined word 'post':

Using Facebook, you can post update sayings about your life everyday.

Mark the letter A, B, C, or D to indicate the word CLOSEST in meaning to the underlined word 'efficient':

Adverts on Facebook seem to be more efficient than billboards or TV ads because of its enormous number of users.

Mark the letter A, B, C, or D to indicate the word CLOSEST in meaning to the underlined word 'endeavoring':

After many year of unsuccessfully endeavoring to form his own orchestra, Glenn Miller finally achieved world fame in 1939 as a big band leader.

Choose the best answer to complete the sentence:

I can't stand ____________ people who are not tolerant of new ideas.

Choose the best answer to complete the dialogue:

Patient: "Can I make an appointment to see the doctor, please?"
Receptionist: "________"

Choose the best answer to complete the sentence:

I ____________ there once a long time ago and ____________ back since.

Choose the best answer to complete the sentence:

You can ____________ new words in the dictionary.

Choose the best answer to complete the sentence:

____________ you study for these exams ____________ you will do.
